title: Fun urf champions
body: im not looking for strong im looking for fun like i played a ap tryndamere and it was reallly funny and fun to play not champions to just steamroll a game but more a less a fun experience

replies.body:
AP Ashe

Pros:

* Take half their HP with every one of your 20 sec CD ultimates.
* With Lich Bane and Luden's Echo, you can easily kill anyone who isn't a tank by the time the stun wears off, even from point-blank range.
* Absolutely hilarious
* Actually engaging, takes skill to play well, and rewards you for careful calcuations
* Once you get to 2-shotting people with your ult, tracking someone for 15 seconds after you've hit them with your first one is absolutely thrilling (as long as they don't just heal back to full in that time)

Cons:

* Not insanely OP like some other stuff
* You aren't going to be dealing tons of damage with ult until you get your first bog item or two.

Build: {{item:3285}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3157}}

Last item is a flex pick, usually between and offensive item like {{item:3151}} or a defensive item such as {{item:3026}} or {{item:3102}}. You can buy {{item:3255}} early game if you'd like, but you should sell it once you hit 6 items and you can replace it with a more expensive item.

Buy {{item:2139}} for the AP or {{item:2137}} if you need to take towers and want health.

{{item:3115}} Is less effective than you might think, since the CDR is useless, and you aren't going to win a close range fight with anyone unless you chunk them with your ult first.

I don't see it, so I'll mention it: AP {{champion:41}} .

Start with a {{item:1036}} and pots, and Q as your first ability. Get W at lvl2, because it's important. Rush Lich Bane to make your Qs *really* hurt, and proceed to basically live forever, while clearing whatever waves you want ever 20 seconds.

I like Luden's Echo - though it only procs from ult - and of course Rab Cap. Build the rest to taste.

If you have a lane that can 1v2, try {{champion:121}} Jungle. His clear speed and mobility are stupidly fast and since most people are playing things like Ez and Katarina you can just pop into lanes while on your way to the next camp and just pop them out of existence. Late game is kinda iffy and you're better of split pushing because that isolation makes all the difference. Drop the Mobi's and grab a Zephy instead, dunno why people are so intent on buying boots on this mode.
{{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} Hit 6, buy a {{item:3077}} ,and dunk. Also take {{summoner:14}} .

I think mages that are mana depended are the most fun, swain, veigar, velkoz, brand, malzahar, xerath all the spammers like karthus , i like adcs with cross map ults too, and of course varus !! Qqqqqqqqqqqqq kill

{{champion:37}}  Sona is freaking op. Build full ap on her and your poke will hurt. Also, you can spam heals, damage, and mobility. She's fun in URF.

{{champion:120}} There's also the infamous Hecacopter. Hecarim can turn a losing game into a winning one if you snowball correctly. Infinite AoE damage, a little sustain, and mobility off the wazoo make Hec an insta-ban, but a very fun champ

{{champion:222}} Then there's Jinx. Her W is now her auto attack in URF. Sprinkle in some Flamechompers on the ground and you could zone your enemy easily, but URF Jinx's bread and butter is her Ult. Every 18 seconds, you can fire a rocket all the way across the map. With good aim, you could save a teammates life, and look awesome in the process.

{{champion:80}} If I feel like it, I sometimes go Panth. His spears make him an ADC now because of their 0.8 second cool down in URF. You can then stun people for days with your jump thingy. After stabbing and jumping on your enemy a few times, put em out of their misery with the jabby skill. Also, Panth has that block passive, so you can tower dive a little safer. His ult is good for helping a brutha out in another lane. Overall, Panth is fun.

Whenever I URF, these are my top choices.

The thing is if you don't pick a champion that can steamroll others will do it so there will be no fun for you. I always go {{champion:120}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:122}} and have so much fun with them even if I lose. Also, I always ban {{champion:238}} and  {{champion:37}}.
